about_the_game:
Book of Demons - Collector's Content DLC features the original soundtrack, digital artbook, high resolution key art with source files, a full set of thematic wallpapers and a set of R2G avatars.

BOOK OF DEMONS DIGITAL ARTBOOK

70 pages PDF (137 when printed into book format) featuring exclusive concept art from the game. The artbook is divided into 25 chapters such as: The Archive of Awesome, Pop-up books, The Town, The Rogue, The Maze, The Antipope, Gargoyles & Demons, User Interface, Cards, etc. Includes Things that didn't make it and Wrong Turns chapters.

DIGITAL POSTER

High resolution Book of Demons Key-art digital poster with source PSD file.

THEMATIC WALLPAPERS

18 thematic wallpapers in 2160p (16:9) and 2400p (16:10) resolutions. All wallpapers are without any logos or overlay text.

R2G AVATARS

24 Return 2 Games and Book of Demons avatars in 512x512 high quality JPG files.

BOOK OF DEMON'S PROTOTYPE

This is the earliest playable build we used to see if the game will work (Windows only). The prototype features the early Flexiscope, early gameplay mechanics and classes (only Warrior has cards), cards as we envisaged them back then, one of the first Town mockups, developer cheat codes and probably some derelict bugs too. Not to mention totally "programmer art" graphics.

FULL ORIGINAL SOUNDTRACK

All tracks are provided in lossless FLAC and HQ MP3. Total soundtrack length is 38 minutes.

>>>>
01 - Return 2 Games Intro
02 - Return 2 Games Main Theme
03 - Book of Demons Intro
04 - Book of Demons Town Theme
05 - Book of Demons Maze Theme & Battle Music
06 - Book of Demons Maze II Theme & Battle Music
07 - Book of Demons Catacombs Theme & Battle Music
08 - Book of Demons Catacombs II Theme & Battle Music
09 - Book of Demons Hell Theme & Battle Music
10 - Book of Demons Hell II Theme & Battle Music
11 - Book of Demons Quest Battle Music
12 - Book of Demons Incantation Theme
13 - Book of Demons Antipope Incantation
14 - Book of Demons Cook Incantation
15 - Book of Demons Archdemon Incantation
16 - Book of Demons Archdemon Dies (outro)
17 - Book of Demons Die, Demons Die Song
18 - Book of Demons Die, Demons Die Song (Karaoke)
19 - Book of Demons Die, Demons Die Song (alternate ending)
20 - Book of Demons Reveal Trailer Music
21 - Book of Demons R2G Main Theme (performed live by 99 dollar orchestra)
detailed_description:
Content Location

After installing the DLC, you can find the Collector's Content in the local folder of the game. To navigate there, please right-click on the game in your library and select: Properties -> Local Files -> Browse Local Files.
